title: Flandrien Scholarship Expands Pathway for Cycling’s Underrepresented Racers
content:
A Belgium-based program offers stays in Flanders for emerging global talent for six to 12-week stints in cycling’s heartland.

Read the full article at Flandrien Scholarship Expands Pathway for Cycling’s Underrepresented Racers on Velo.
author: ahood
